verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: Thou \add art\add* to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than thyself, \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and fenced \w up|strong="H1219"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*,

A \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w tall|strong="H7311"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w*, whom thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*, and \add of whom\add* thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add say\add*, Who can \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*!

\w Understand|strong="H3045"\w* therefore this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* he which goeth \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; \add as\add* a \w consuming|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* he shall \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* them, and he shall bring them \w down|strong="H3665"\w* before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: so shalt thou drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee.

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* not thou in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, after that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath cast them \w out|strong="H1920"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, For my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath brought me \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but for the \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* of these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* doth drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

Not for thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, or for the \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, dost thou \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: but for the \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* of these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and that he may \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Understand|strong="H3045"\w* therefore, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee not this \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it for thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; for thou \add art\add* a \w stiffnecked|strong="H6203"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Â¶ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \add and\add* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not, how thou provokedst the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: \w from|strong="H4480"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou didst depart \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, until ye \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, ye have been \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Also in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* ye \w provoked|strong="H7107"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w*, so that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with you to have \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* you.

When I was gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \add even\add* the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with you, then I \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*, I neither did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* unto me \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* with the \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and on them \add was written\add* according to all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with you in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*, \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \add even\add* the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, get thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w* from hence; for thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which thou hast brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* have \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* \add themselves;\add* they are \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w* turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them; they have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them a molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*.

Furthermore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and, behold, it \add is\add* a \w stiffnecked|strong="H6203"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

Let me \w alone|strong="H7503"\w*, that I may \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* them, and blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* their \w name|strong="H8034"\w* from under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: and I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H0854"\w* thee a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* and \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* than they.

So I \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \add were\add* in my \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, ye had \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add and\add* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* you a \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*: ye had turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you.

And I \w took|strong="H8610"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them out \w of|strong="H5921"\w* my \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* them before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And I fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*: I did neither \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, because of all your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* which ye \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, in \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to provoke him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

For I was \w afraid|strong="H3025"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and hot \w displeasure|strong="H2534"\w*, wherewith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* against you to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* you. But the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me at that \w time|strong="H6471"\w* also.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* to have \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* him: and I \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* also the same \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

And I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* your \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* which ye had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H3807"\w* it, \add and\add* \w ground|strong="H2912"\w* \add it\add* very \w small|strong="H3190"\w*, \add even\add* until it was as \w small|strong="H1854"\w* as \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: and I \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* thereof into the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* that descended \w out|strong="H3381"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And at \w Taberah|strong="H8404"\w*, and at \w Massah|strong="H4532"\w*, and at \w Kibroth-hattaavah|strong="H6914"\w*, ye provoked the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w*.

Likewise when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you from \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you; then ye \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and ye \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* him not, nor \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.
Ye have been \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* you.

Thus I fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*, as I fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \add at the first;\add* because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he would \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* you.

I \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* therefore unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* not thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, which thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* through thy \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, which thou hast brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; \w look|strong="H6437"\w* not unto the \w stubbornness|strong="H7190"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, nor to their \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, nor to their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*:

Lest the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whence thou broughtest us \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* them, and because he \w hated|strong="H8135"\w* them, he hath brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

Yet they \add are\add* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, which thou broughtest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by thy \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and by thy stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*.
